Title: Scope
Description: This Regulation applies to vehicles of category L. [Annotation 1]
Item: (a) Vehicles with a Vmax of < 25 km/h;
Annotation 1: *1 As defined in the Consolidated Resolution on the Construction of Vehicles (R.E.3), document ECE/TRANS/WP.29/78/Rev.6, para. 2 – https://unece.org/transport/standards/transport/vehicle -regulations -wp29/resolutions
